Key Match Events: Derrick White scored 26 points, including 13 in the fourth quarter.
White blocked two shots and limited Anthony Edwards to 15 points.
Pre-Game Insights: Derrick White had 10th-most votes among Eastern Conference guards in early All-Star voting.
Jaylen Brown is out with a right shoulder strain.
Post-Match Reflections: White told NBC Sports Boston that he wasn't pleased with his recent shooting performances but seemed to have his swagger back.
Coach Joe Mazzulla expected Derrick White to impact the game in any way possible.
Miscellaneous Highlights: White is averaging career-high averages in points, rebounds, blocks, steals, and 3-point makes.
White is one of only two players in the league averaging at least three 3-pointers and one block per game.
